DELETE [SELECT Id FROM JBCXM__UIViews__c WHERE NAME ='Customer_Tag_UIView'];
String columnList = '[{"name":"TrendIndicator__c","label":"Trend Indicator","displayOrder":1,'+
					'"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CustomerInfo__c","fieldType":"CUSTOMLOOKUP",'+
					'"isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":true},{"name":"Status__r.Name","label":"Status",'+

					'"objectName":"CustomerInfo__c","fieldType":"CUSTOMLOOKUP","isGroupable":true,'+
					'"hasJBCXMNS":true},{"name":"Tag__c","label":"Tag","displayOrder":4,"visibilityMode":true,'+

					'"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CustomerInfo__c","fieldType":"CURRENCY",'+
					'"isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":true},{"name":"MRR__c","label":"MRR","displayOrder":6,'+
					'"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CustomerInfo__c","fieldType":"CURRENCY",'+
					'"isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":true},{"name":"Users__c","label":"Users",'+
					'"displayOrder":7,"visibilityMode":true,"objectName":"CustomerInfo__c",'+
					'"fieldType":"DOUBLE","isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":true},{"name":'+
					'"RevenueBand__c","label":"Revenue Band","displayOrder":8,"visibilityMode":true,'+
					'"objectName":"CustomerInfo__c","fieldType":"CUSTOMLOOKUP","isGroupable":true,'+

					'"TEXTAREA","isGroupable":false,"hasJBCXMNS":true}]';
JBCXM__UIViews__c uiview = new JBCXM__UIViews__c(Name = 'Customer_Tag_UIView',
												JBCXM__ColumnList__c = columnList,
												JBCXM__FilterConditions__c = '[]',
												JBCXM__IsShown__c = true,
												JBCXM__IsStandard__c= false,
												JBCXM__ReportParams__c = '[]',

												JBCXM__UITabName__c = 'Customers',

												JBCXM__VisualType__c = 'List');
insert uiview;
